source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Thiuna's esteem for you has grown.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>依頼品を納品したことで、
トゥナはあなたの貢献を実感し始めました。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>Deliver the items Thiuna needs, and deliver them often to learn more about her!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>今後も積極的に依頼品の納品を行い、
貢献度を蓄積させていきましょう！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_000<tab>There's a lot to do when restoring a painting, but nothing's so important as the canvas. Let me know when the repair material is ready.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_000<tab>依頼品の絵画から、描いた人の想いが伝わってくる……。
在りし日の故郷への想い、しっかり修復しないと……！
「<var 28 ((Item)) F26A6801 /var>」の製作、お願いね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_050<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! This is fine work indeed, more than suitable for our purposes. I'll put it to good use.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_050<tab>ありがとう、助かるわ！
なるほど……丁寧に作られていて、品質が安定している。
この素材で、私も修復作業を進めるわね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_051<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I was expecting quality from you, but this surpasses anything I could've imagined! I'll put it to good use!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_051<tab>ありがとう、助かるわ！
これは……こんなに質の高い素材、今まで見たことがないよ。
私も見習わないと……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>Two days later...
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) F26A6801 /var>」を使用して、
トゥナは無事に修復作業を完了させたようだ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_102<tab>It's done! The painting is restored! Now I can finally...<yawn>...get some sleep...
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_102<tab>ふわあ……眠い……これで2日ぶりに眠れる……。
あなたが製作してくれた素材のおかげで、
無事に「レイクランド風景画」の修復が完成したわ……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_103<tab>Thanks to the quality of your material, the painting should prove durable in any climate. The beautiful colors and fine details will survive a long time.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_103<tab>あれだけの品質の素材を使えば、環境変化の影響にも強く、
風景画の美しい色合いや、細やかな描き込みも、
きっと長く保つことができるはずよ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_104<tab>Now then, if you'll wait just a moment, I'll deliver it to the client. Oh, and I'll be sure to mention your contribution!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_104<tab>さて、さっそく依頼主さんのところへ納品に行かないと！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんの活躍のこと、
しっかり伝えておくから、ちょっと待っててね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_105<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. When I told our client about you, he insisted on coming to thank you personally. This is Thaltall.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_105<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
依頼主のサルトールさんが、
ぜひあなたに直接お礼を言いたいそうよ！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THALTALL_000_106<tab>So you are <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Thank you ever so much for helping to restore our painting!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THALTALL_000_106<tab>あなたが<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんですね！
トゥナさんから聞きましたよ、丁寧な仕事ぶりを！
本当にありがとうございます！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THALTALL_000_107<tab>To others, it may be an unremarkable work of art. But to me and my family, it's an irreplaceable treasure─an heirloom from days gone by.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THALTALL_000_107<tab>あの風景画は、私にとって……
いえ、私の一族にとって、とても大切なものなのです。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_108<tab>From the days when Lakeland was the domain of the elves...
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_108<tab>レイクランドはその昔……
エルフ族の国家が支配していた地域だったのよね。
罪喰いの大群が押し寄せ、すべてを破壊し尽くすまでは……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THALTALL_000_109<tab>For generations, my family called Dampsole home. There we lived in peace and thrived thanks to the bounty of the Source, surviving war and famine alike.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THALTALL_000_109<tab>私の一族は、ダンプソールの村で何世代も生活してきました。
長い歴史の中では、戦乱に巻き込まれることもありましたが、
「始まりの湖」の恵みを糧に、慎ましく暮らしていたそうです。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THALTALL_000_110<tab>But the sin eaters came and took everything from us. In memory of his beloved home and departed kin, my artist ancestor took brush to canvas. The result being the painting you've restored.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THALTALL_000_110<tab>罪喰いどもは、そんな私の一族から何もかもを……。
あの風景画は、祖先が二度と戻ることができない故郷を想い、
この世を去ってしまった家族を想い、描いたものなのです。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THALTALL_000_111<tab>For long years we've looked after the painting...but in the heat of a quarrel with my brother, I'm ashamed to say I went and damaged it. As I was ruing my foolishness, I came to know about Thiuna and her workshop.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THALTALL_000_111<tab>そんな、一族にとってかけがえのない風景画を、
兄とのちょっとした言い合いの折に壊してしまって……。
困り果てていたところに、トゥナさんの店の噂を聞いたのです。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THALTALL_000_112<tab>Words fail to express how glad I am that I did. With the painting in hand, I will go to my brother and make amends with him. After all, he's the only family I have left in the world.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THALTALL_000_112<tab>修復いただいた風景画を持って、さっそく兄に謝りに行ってきます！
今となっては、私と兄、たったふたりだけの家族ですから……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THALTALL_000_113<tab>From the bottom of my heart, I thank you. You haven't only restored a painting─you've restored the bond between my brother and me.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THALTALL_000_113<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
一族の絆の証を修復してくれて、本当にありがとうございました。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_114<tab>I didn't know the full story till now...but I'm glad it ends well.
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_114<tab>よかった……大切なもの、ちゃんと守れて……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_115<tab>And it's in no small part due to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_115<tab>これも、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんのおかげよ。
本当にありがとう……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_116<tab>Ah, but to have family...
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_116<tab>それにしても、家族っていいな……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_140<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, how good to see you! Give me just a moment to clean up.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_140<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
また来てくれて嬉しいわ！
あ、ちょっと待ってね……今片付けるから！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_145<tab>The next request will be available from Thiuna upon reaching level 73 as a carpenter, leatherworker, or weaver.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_145<tab>次の納品依頼は、
「木工師／革細工師／裁縫師」のいずれかがレベル73以上になると、
ミーン工芸館の「トゥナ」から受注可能です。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_150<tab>We're in the midst of analyzing the leftover bits of the material you crafted.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_150<tab>丁度、あなたが作ってくれた素材の残りを使って、
この子に分析してもらいながら勉強していたところよ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_151<tab><blip> Aside from recordkeeping, I also excel in analysis. Impressive, yes?
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_151<tab>ピピ……記録、分析、お手のモノ！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_152<tab>Because restoration draws upon techniques from multiple fields, it's important to understand how certain materials and chemicals react with one another.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_152<tab>保存修復の作業には幅広い知識が必要よ。
素材や薬品が混ぜ合わさったときに、
それぞれがどう作用するかの、正しい理解が必要なの。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_153<tab>Over the years, I've handled my fair share of materials, and I can honestly say that yours are a cut above the rest. There's no greater proof than the superior final products they produce.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_153<tab>いろんな素材を扱ってきたからわかるけど、
あなたの製作物は本当に素晴らしい……加工精度が段違いだわ。
実際に作業に取り掛かってみて、その質の高さがよくわかったの。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_154<tab>I consider myself truly blessed to be able to learn from you.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_154<tab>依頼品を完璧に修復するためにも、
あなたからもっともっと、多くのことを学んでいきたい……！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、これからもよろしくね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_OWELL_000_155<tab>(-Fractious Artisan-)Still playing around with that floating rustball, I see.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_OWELL_000_155<tab>(-気難しそうな職人-)お前、まだそんな玉っころと、
ごっこ遊びを続けていたのか。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_156<tab><blip> Visitor identified as Owell of the Facet of Crafting. <buzz> ...What is a rustball?
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_156<tab>ピピ……手工科の職人、「オーエル」と認識。
……玉っころトハ？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_OWELL_000_157<tab>Why don't you make yourself useful for a change? Make something useful?
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_OWELL_000_157<tab>そんな無駄な遊びを続けるくらいなら、
実用品のひとつやふたつ作った方が、よほど有益だろうが。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_158<tab>After all this time ignoring me, those are the only words you have? And we're not playing around, I'll have you know.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_158<tab>もう……。
久しぶりに話しかけてきたと思ったら、いきなりそんなこと……。
保存修復の仕事は「遊び」なんかじゃないのよ？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_159<tab>We've served many clients already, and there's bound to be more folk out there who have cherished items they want restored. They simply don't know who to ask for help.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_159<tab>実際に依頼もあるし、ちゃんと実績もあるんだから！
……みんな、そこらの職人には依頼しづらいだけで、
大事なものを直したいと思っている人は必ずいるはずよ！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_160<tab>What's more, we have a veteran artisan on board now, who prepares the materials we need─<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here. <var 08 E905 ((Her)) ((His)) /var> skills are at least the equal of Master Harig.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_160<tab>それに今は、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんっていう、
腕利きの職人さんに、素材の製作を協力してもらってる。
……ハリッグ師匠にだって、決して劣らない腕前よ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_OWELL_000_161<tab>Hmph, skills or no, it's nothing but a waste of precious resources. You'd do well to open your eyes to reality. It's all around you.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_OWELL_000_161<tab>フン……これ以上貴重な資源を無駄にする前に、
とっとと現実を見ることだな。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_162<tab><buzz> What is a rustball?
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_162<tab>玉っころトハー？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_163<tab>That was Owell. It might not seem so from that exchange, but we used to be close. We both lost our parents at a tender age, you see, and a man named Harig took us in as his apprentices.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_163<tab>彼はオーエルっていって、私の兄弟子よ。
お互い、早くに両親を喪った孤児だったんだけど、
ハリッグという師に拾われて、弟子として育てられたの。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_164<tab>Master Harig was a restorer, and it was he who inspired me to become one too.
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_164<tab>……私が保存修復師を目指したのも、師匠の影響なのよ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_165<tab>When I was little, I had a doll. It was a memento of my late mother, and I treasured it like life itself. But old as it was, one day it fell apart.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_165<tab>私がまだ小さかった頃ね、
大事にしていた、母さんの形見の人形が壊れて、
工芸館の隅っこで、ひとり泣いていたことがあるの。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_166<tab>Back then, we suffered from far worse shortages than we do now. Everyone at the Mean struggled to do their work with limited resources, and no one spared a glance for a broken toy.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_166<tab>当時の工芸館は、今よりももっと物資が不足していて、
みんながみんな、今日を生きることに必死だった……。
人形が壊れたくらいじゃ、誰も相手にしてくれなかったわ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_167<tab>No one save Master Harig. He found me crying alone, clutching my doll. “No need for tears,” he said kindly. And he took the doll and made it good as new again.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_167<tab>でもね、師匠だけは私のところにきて……
「直してやる。だからもう泣くな」って、声をかけてくれたの。
それで、あっという間に人形を元通りに直してくれた……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_168<tab>There're more such items at the Crystarium, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Items that serve no practical purpose, that won't help us survive...yet mean the world to someone. They wouldn't have found a place among a refugee's scant possessions otherwise.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_168<tab>このクリスタリウムに持ち込まれた美術品や民芸品の多くはさ、
生きるか死ぬかの状況で、「せめてこれだけは」と持ち込まれた品。
それだけ、強い想いが込められているはずじゃない？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_169<tab>They're irreplaceable treasures, and I can't bear to watch them crumble away. As Master Harig mended my doll, so would I mend the ties of others.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_169<tab>私は、そんなみんなの宝物が、
ただ壊れていくところを、見て見ぬふりなんてできない……。
師匠が母さんと私の絆を修復してくれたみたいに、私も直したい！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_170<tab>In many ways, you remind me of Master Harig. Not only are you capable; you're kind and dependable. It's a pleasure working with you, and I hope that our partnership continues for a long time.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_170<tab>だから……<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
よかったら、また私に付き合ってほしいな。
まるで師匠みたいに頼もしいし……なにより、すごく楽しいのよ！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_171<tab>Oh, and thanks to Thaltall singing our praises, we're seeing more restoration requests.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_171<tab>そうそう……この間のサルトールさん、
「時の工房」の宣伝をしてくれているみたい！
徐々にお客さんが増えてきたのよ！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_172<tab>While most are straightforward enough for me to handle alone, I have a task here that promises to be quite challenging. For this, I hope to rely on your crafting expertise.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_172<tab>それで……
また素材製作の協力をしてもらいたいんだけど……。
依頼してもいいかな？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_173<tab>The client is an elderly Drahn lady. She's apparently descended from Voeburtite nobility.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_173<tab>ふふっ、ありがとう……頼りにさせてもらうわ。
今回の依頼主はドラン族のおば様よ。
なんでも「フッブート王国」の貴族の血筋だとか……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_174<tab><blip> The item to be restored is an antique Voeburtite jewelry box. Formerly occupying the land now known as Il Mheg, the kingdom was destroyed by sin eaters following the Flood.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_174<tab>ピピ……依頼品は、フッブート様式の宝石箱。
なお、フッブート王国とは、現在のイル・メグを領有していた国家。
「光の氾濫」の後、罪喰いの襲撃により滅んでイル。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_175<tab>Due to the fact that the nation ceased to exist a century ago, it's difficult to source the materials their people once used.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_175<tab>100年以上前に亡国で作られた品だけに、
その素材の多くが流通していなくて、今や入手困難なのよ……。
特に箱の「内張り」の素材が不足していてね……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_176<tab>In particular, we're struggling to procure suitable fabric for the upholstery, and that is what I would ask you to prepare. My thanks in advance, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_176<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんには、
その「<var 28 ((Item)) F26A6901 /var>」をそろえてもらえると助かるわ！
私も全力で修復作業を頑張るから……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_200<tab>How's that upholstery fabric coming along? Let me know when it's ready.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_200<tab>依頼主さんの想いに応えられるように、
私も修復作業を頑張らなくっちゃ！
「<var 28 ((Item)) F26A6901 /var>」の製作、お願いね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_250<tab>Ah, a fine fabric. I knew I was right to task you with it. With this, I'm confident that we can do a fine job with the jewelry box.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_250<tab>ありがとう、本当に助かるわ！
この品質……やっぱり、あなたに依頼してよかった！
じっくり鑑賞したいところだけど、今は修復に集中しないとね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_251<tab>Oh my, the quality is amazing! It could be considered a work of art in its own right! With this, I'm confident that we can do an excellent job with the jewelry box!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_251<tab>ありがとう、本当に助かるわ！
すごい……使うのがもったいないくらい完成度の高い素材だわ！
じっくり鑑賞したいところだけど、今は修復に集中しないとね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_300<tab>Three days later...
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_300<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) F26A6901 /var>」を使用して、
トゥナは無事に修復作業を完了させたようだ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_301<tab><yawn> I could curl up right here and fall asleep... But first things first─I'm pleased to say that the jewelry box has been restored to its former glory!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_301<tab>あふ……これで3日ぶりに……おふとん…………。
あなたが製作してくれた素材のおかげで、
無事に「フッブート宝石箱」の修復が完了したよ……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_302<tab>I'm especially pleased with how the trimmings turned out. They're as beautifully vibrant as the day they were made, and it's thanks to the quality of the materials you supplied.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_302<tab>元の華やかな装飾が蘇って、見違えるようになったの！
修復の良し悪しは、使用した素材の品質に左右されるから、
その点をサポートしてもらえて、すごく助かったわ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_303<tab>Now then, I'll see this delivered to our client. If you can linger awhile, I'll return soon with word of her impressions!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_303<tab>ふふっ、早く依頼主さんに見せてあげたい！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんが手伝ってくれたこと、
またまたしっかり伝えてくるから、待っててね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_304<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, this is Rosine, our client. She's so pleased with the jewelry box, she wanted to come and thank you herself.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_304<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、大成功よ！
依頼主のロジーヌおば様、すっごく喜んでくれて、
あなたにも直接お礼が言いたいそうなの！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_ROSINE_000_305<tab>Thiuna tells me your contribution was instrumental to its restoration. For that, I offer you my heartfelt gratitude.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_ROSINE_000_305<tab>あなたが、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんね。
トゥナちゃんから、あなたのおかげで修復できたと聞いているわ。
本当にありがとう……大切な宝石箱を直してくれて。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_ROSINE_000_306<tab>My daughter─she will wed soon, you see. The jewelry box is to be my gift to her on her special day.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_ROSINE_000_306<tab>実は、もうすぐこのクリスタリウムで、
私の娘がささやかな結婚式を挙げるのよ。
あの宝石箱は、結婚祝いの贈り物にしたいと思っていたものなの。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_307<tab>Oh my, such joyous news! Our congratulations!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_307<tab>わあ、おめでとうございます！
娘さん、きっと喜びますね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_ROSINE_000_308<tab>With my husband no longer with us, life has been hard. There's nothing grand I can offer my daughter. Yet humble though it is, the box holds special meaning to our family.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_ROSINE_000_308<tab>生活が豊かとは言えない今では、
豪華な贈り物なんて、とてもしてやれないけれど……
あの宝石箱は、私の一族にとっては特別に意味のあるものなのよ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_ROSINE_000_309<tab>It's been with us since before my ancestors fled Voeburt. While most of them sought refuge in Eulmore, my great-grandmother and her husband chose to begin anew at the Crystarium.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_ROSINE_000_309<tab>私の一族は、祖国であるフッブート王国の貴族につながる血筋でね。
罪喰いたちに国を滅ぼされた後、多くの親族がユールモアに向かう中、
曽祖母は愛する夫とクリスタリウムへと移住したの。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_ROSINE_000_310<tab>The box came with her, laden with the memories of her lost home. It was passed down to my grandmother, then to my mother, then eventually to me. It's a treasured heirloom, our connection to a time long past, and we've taken care of it as best we could. Alas, the years inevitably began to tell on it.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_ROSINE_000_310<tab>曽祖母が祖国への想いと共に持ち出したあの宝石箱は、
曽祖母から祖母へ、祖母から母へ……
そうやって、代々受け継がれてきた、大事なものなのよ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_ROSINE_000_311<tab>Now the time has come for me to pass the box to my daughter, but its condition was such that I was embarrassed to do so. Thanks to you and Thiuna, however, I can pass it on proudly.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_ROSINE_000_311<tab>女手ひとつで、やっとの思いで育て上げた娘の晴れの日に、
母が私にくれた宝石箱を、私も母親として娘に贈りたい……。
あなたはその願いを叶え、一族の絆を修復してくれたわ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_ROSINE_000_312<tab>No words will suffice to express my gratitude. I'm forever in your debt.
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_ROSINE_000_312<tab>本当にありがとう、素敵な職人さんたち。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_313<tab>Such a special connection to have with your family and homeland... An orphan like me can only dream.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_313<tab>一族の絆か……。
一族どころか、祖国も知らない私には、少し羨ましいな……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_314<tab>I'd love to visit your homeland one day. Will you promise to take me there?
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_314<tab>いつか、私もあなたの祖国を見てみたいな。
連れていってくれる？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_315<tab>...Oh, I'm merely jesting! No need to look so troubled!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_315<tab>……なーんてね、冗談よ！
ふふっ……これからもよろしくね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_316<tab><blip> I too have a homeland. Glory be to Allag. Long may she endure.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_316<tab>祖国、ワタシにもアル！
アラグ帝国バンザイ！　アラグ帝国バンザイ！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_340<tab>And that's another one in the books... Whew!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_340<tab>あら、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
ちょうど今、新規の依頼品の修復が終わって、
ひと息ついたところなのよ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_345<tab>The next request will be available from Thiuna upon reaching level 75 as a carpenter, leatherworker, or weaver.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_345<tab>次の納品依頼は、
「木工師／革細工師／裁縫師」のいずれかがレベル75以上になると、
ミーン工芸館の「トゥナ」から受注可能です。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_350<tab>Tell me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─what do you think is the difference between repair and restoration?
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_350<tab>ねぇ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんは……
「保存修復」と「修理」の違いって、
どんな点にあると思う？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_351<tab>In my mind, the aim of repair is to make something work as intended again. In contrast, the aim of restoration is to return something to its original state.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_351<tab>私が考えるに……「保存修復」は「修理」と違って、
単に損なわれた機能を「補完」するものではないという点よ。
「元の状態」に戻すことこそ、保存修復の目的……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_352<tab>That being the case, in order to do a good job of restoring, it's crucial to know what materials were originally used, and how. This requires a great deal of research and analysis, and that is where Noddy has been most helpful.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_352<tab>だから、どんな種類の素材が使われているのかを分析して、
元の状態がどのようなものだったのかを徹底的に調べあげる。
……それには、この子が大活躍なのよ！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_353<tab><blip> Noddy is a most helpful node.
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_353<tab>エッヘン！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_354<tab>Now, an item may bear what appear to be imperfections, be they scuffs and scratches or peculiarities in the woodgrain. While we may instinctively want to remove such marks, we must be mindful that they may hold special meaning to the owner.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_354<tab>それから……時を経て受け継がれてきた、傷や風合いなんかも、
依頼主にとっては、大切な思い出や個性となっている場合があるわ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_355<tab>Of course, if there's clearly damage that impairs function, we must mend it as best we can.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_355<tab>でも、明らかに破損していたり、虫食いで腐っていたり、
機能的に問題がある部分は、しっかり直してあげないといけない。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_356<tab>These decisions, we make through consultation with the client. We see through his eyes the item as it once was─and then strive to recreate it.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_356<tab>じっくりと依頼主と相談しながら、
世界にひとつだけの「宝物」を蘇らせられるかどうかは、
保存修復師の腕の見せ所なのよ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_357<tab>Now, it hardly needs saying, but a restoration effort can only be as good as the materials used. I hope that Cherished Memories can continue relying on you!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_357<tab>それには、あなたが作ってくれるような、
質の高い修復用素材が、必要不可欠なんだ！
だから……まだまだ「時の工房」に付き合ってね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_358<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Right, enough chatter─it's time to get back to work!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_358<tab>ふふっ、ありがとう！
さあて……みんなが安心して修復を任せられる店にするためにも、
もうひと仕事、頑張らなきゃね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_359<tab><blip> There are currently three outstanding tasks. Of these, three are urgent.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_359<tab>現在の依頼、3件！
そのうち、期限が迫っているもの……ピピ……
3件！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_360<tab>T-Time to get back to work indeed!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_360<tab>げ……ヤバッ！
急いで依頼案件を整理しないと……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_361<tab>Do you have time to assist me with another task, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_361<tab>そ、それで、さっそくあなたの協力が必要な案件がありまして……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_362<tab>Wonderful!
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_362<tab>本当にありがとう、頼りにさせてもらうわ！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_363<tab>This time, the client is a Zun amaro handler, and the item is a set of amaro barding. A <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> old set. We have our work cut out for us.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_363<tab>次の依頼主は、アマロを飼育しているズン族よ。
依頼品は「アマロの装身具」……とても歴史あるものなんだけど、
かなり損傷が酷くって……大仕事になりそうだわ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_364<tab>Before the Flood swallowed up their homeland, the Zun lived as nomadic folk. Amaro were a central part of their lives, and even something commonplace like their barding may carry great sentimental value.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_364<tab>彼らの故郷も、「光の氾濫」に呑まれてしまったそうよ……。
元々遊牧民だった彼らにとって、アマロは特別な存在。
装身具ひとつにだって、さまざまな想いが込められているはず……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_365<tab>That being the case, we must give no less than our best. Not that we ever do otherwise, of course!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_365<tab>だから、その想いまで失われてしまわないように、
私たちがしっかり修復してあげなきゃ……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_366<tab>Now, as to the specifics. What I require from you is the material for repairing the barding's inner lining. As the part that is in contact with the amaro, comfort is of the utmost import. My thanks in advance, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_366<tab>あなたに製作をお任せしたい素材は、
裏張りに使う「<var 28 ((Item)) F26A6A01 /var>」よ。
よろしくお願いね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_400<tab>To simply behold the barding, one can sense the love the Zun bear for amaro. We'll do that love justice, you and I. Let me know when you have the repair material for me.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_400<tab>ズン族の伝統の装身具……。
触れただけでも、アマロへの愛情が伝わってくるようだわ。
どうか「<var 28 ((Item)) F26A6A01 /var>」の製作、お願いね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_450<tab>Hmmm, yes, this is solid work, as I know to expect from you. A flawlessly crafted piece that plays to the material's properties. I will see to it my restoration lives up to its quality.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_450<tab>見事だわ……！
材料の特性を活かした、非の打ち所がない品質……。
よーし、私も全力で修復作業に取り掛かからないと！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_451<tab>Goodness, but this is exemplary work! In this material alone, you can see all the marks of a first-rate artisan─and small wonder, seeing as you made it! I will see to it my restoration lives up to its quality!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_451<tab>わあ……！
この素材ひとつに、一流職人としての技を見て取れる……。
よーし、私も全力で修復作業に取り掛かからないと！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>Four days later...
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) F26A6A01 /var>」を使用して、
トゥナは無事に修復作業を完了させたようだ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_501<tab><snore> <var 08 E905 ((Mother)) ((Father)) /var>...? <mumble> Is...is that you?
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_501<tab>むにゃむにゃ…………<var 08 E905 ((ママ)) ((パパ)) /var>…………？

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_502<tab>Uwaaah! F-Forget you heard any of that!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_502<tab>……………はっ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！？
わあああ、ごめんなさい！
ね……寝ぼけてたみたい……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_503<tab>Ahem! It's done, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! That was one of my hardest tasks to date, but the amaro barding is restored!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_503<tab>ええと、あなたが製作してくれた素材のおかげで、
無事に「アマロ装身具」の修復が完成したところよ……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_504<tab>In the course of using your material, I noticed the little details─the techniques you employed to alleviate the burden on the beasts. Such a thing would never have occurred to me. It reminds me how much I still have to learn.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_504<tab>あなたの素材は、身に着けるアマロの身体に負担がかからないよう、
細部の加工まできっちりと、丁寧に仕上げられていたわ。
本当に、見習うべきところがたくさんある……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_505<tab>Now, we mustn't keep our client waiting. I'll be back soon!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_505<tab>さて、私は例のごとく、依頼主さんのところへ納品に行ってくるね！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんの大活躍のこと、
ちゃーんと、伝えておくからね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_506<tab>So, this has become something of a regularity, but our client wants to thank you himself. May I introduce Szen Gwonbai.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_506<tab>お待たせしてごめんなさい！
こちらは、依頼主のゼン・グォンバイさん。
どうしてもあなたにお礼をって言っているの！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SZENGWONBAI_000_507<tab>Thiuna was most effusive in her praise of you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and I simply had to put a face to the name. Thank you for your part in restoring the barding.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SZENGWONBAI_000_507<tab>キミが、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>か。
トゥナから聞いた、修復を手伝ってくれたそうだね？
感謝、感謝！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SZENGWONBAI_000_508<tab>Allow me to introduce the fine beast who will wear it.
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SZENGWONBAI_000_508<tab>見てくれ、我らの自慢のアマロを！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_509<tab><blip> Amaro detected. Proximity: too close for comfort. Uh oh. Uh oh.
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_509<tab>ピピ……アマロ、ニガテ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SZENGWONBAI_000_510<tab>As you may know, we Zun once lived as nomads. In that hard life, amaro contributed as much as any man to our collective survival, and we regarded them as family, raising them as we would our own children.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SZENGWONBAI_000_510<tab>我らズン族が、遊牧の民であったことは知っていよう？
そんな我らにとって、アマロとは家族も同然の存在。
とっても、とっても、大切に育てていた。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SZENGWONBAI_000_511<tab>Sadly, full many were lost to the Flood, and to this day we lament our failure to save them.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SZENGWONBAI_000_511<tab>だが、「光の氾濫」で多くの仲間もアマロも犠牲になった。
守ってやれなかったこと、ご先祖たちはとても後悔していた……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SZENGWONBAI_000_512<tab>The barding you restored is an honored artifact. Since ancient times, it has been tradition to bestow it upon the finest amaro and its handler each turning of the seasons.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SZENGWONBAI_000_512<tab>依頼した装身具は、はるか昔より、
その年にもっとも立派に育ったアマロと飼い主に贈られる、
名誉ある品とされてきた。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SZENGWONBAI_000_513<tab>It is our sole connection to our old way of life. By restoring it, you've preserved an important part of our history─of our identity.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SZENGWONBAI_000_513<tab>今や、この装身具だけが古来の暮らしとの繋がり。
我らの歴史と伝統を直してくれて、感謝、感謝。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SZENGWONBAI_000_514<tab>I understand there are those who disapprove of what you do. But know that you have the complete and unequivocal approval of we Zun. On behalf of my people, I thank you.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SZENGWONBAI_000_514<tab>そうそう。
キミたちの活動に反対している人がいるみたいだけど、
我らズン族は、キミたちを応援するぞ！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_515<tab>There truly is no limit to the sentimental value an item can hold. I'm glad that we could be of service to the Zun.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_515<tab>装身具ひとつにも、たくさんの想いと物語がある……。
今に繋がる歴史と伝統、修復できてよかったぁ……。
これもあなたのおかげよ、本当にありがとう。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_516<tab>And while it gives me heart to have their support, as Szen says, not everyone shares the sentiment. Owell not least of all... <sigh>
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_516<tab>はぁ……。
それにしても、反対している人ってオーエルのことよね。
もう……困ったなぁ……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_517<tab><blip> A feathered reptile, amaro are known to spray water from their nostrils. <buzz> Water and nodes do not mix.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_517<tab>ピピ……アマロ、鼻から水飛ばす。
ニガテ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_518<tab>A new quest continuing the story of Cherished Memories is now available. Upon its completion, the Crystarium Deliveries list for Thiuna will be updated.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_518<tab>また、「トゥナ」から受注可能な、
ミーン工芸館取引のストーリークエストが発行されました！
クエストをコンプリートすることで、納品リストが更新されます。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_540<tab>So, with regards to the lute...
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_540<tab>それで……相談させてもらっていた、
リュートの修復のことなんだけど……

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_545<tab>The next request will be available from Thiuna upon reaching level 78 as a carpenter, leatherworker, or weaver.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_545<tab>次の納品依頼は、
「木工師／革細工師／裁縫師」のいずれかがレベル78以上になると、
ミーン工芸館の「トゥナ」から受注可能です。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_550<tab>Following analysis, we've determined the materials we require for the instrument's restoration.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_550<tab>壊れたリュートを分析して、
必要な素材をピックアップしたわ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_551<tab>Well, as best we could, at any rate. You see, being a gift from the Exarch, it likely hails from his mysterious homeland.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_551<tab>ただ、ひとつ不思議なのは……
私が調べた、どの国、どの時代の様式のリュートとも、
微妙に違う形状をしているってことなのよ……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_552<tab>As a result, it matches no lute from any culture or era I could find information on. Its shape is subtly different─as are some of the materials used. For these, we're having to make our best approximation.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_552<tab>師匠はこのリュートを水晶公から譲られたって言っていたけど……。
こればっかりは仕方ない……手工科で扱っていない素材は、
私が近いものを加工するしかないわね……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_553<tab><blip> That is unlikely to produce the desired─ <buzzzzzz> Blockage detect...detect...detect...
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_553<tab>それは……ザザ……ピー。
アレ……？
ザ……詰マッタ……ザザ……。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_554<tab>Right then, let's begin. As usual, I ask that you craft me the materials we need.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_554<tab>よーし、さっそく修復作業に集中しなきゃ！
「<var 28 ((Item)) F26A6B01 /var>」の製作、よろしくお願いね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_555<tab>Mark my words, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we'll succeed yet. We'll make Owell see the true worth of restoration.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_555<tab>保存修復がみんなの心にもたらす影響を、
オーエルにも、ちゃんとわかってもらうんだ……！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_556<tab>Help me... Help... <buzzzzzz>
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_556<tab>トゥナ……ザザ……タタイ……ザ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_600<tab>Hm, in order to stabilize the material, we'll need this and... Oh, greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_600<tab>うーん……この素材を加工するには……
うん、あの錬金薬と参考資料が必要ね！
ええと、それから…………あっ、ごめんなさい！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_650<tab>Ah, yet another impeccable example of crafting from you. I shall put this to good use.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_650<tab>これは……！
文句のつけようがない、素晴らしい出来だわ！
ありがとう、大事に使わせてもらうね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_651<tab>Oh, my... The quality is amazing beyond words. It will be a pleasure to put this to use!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_651<tab>あぁ…………！
もう……ため息がでるほど、秀逸な出来だわ……。
ありがとう、大事に使わせてもらうね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_700<tab>My thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Now we have all that we require to restore the lute.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_700<tab>これで必要な素材はひと通り揃ったはずよ。
本当にありがとう……<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_701<tab>I've never attempted anything so difficult before. I must confess to feeling not a little nervous, but I will give it my earnest best.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_701<tab>こんなに難易度の高い修復は初めてで、少し不安だけど……
あとの修復は、なんとか頑張ってみるわ！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_702<tab>With some luck, I'll have good tidings to share before long!
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_702<tab>修復作業はまだかかるから、しばらくしたら声をかけてね！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_710<tab>A new quest continuing the story of Cherished Memories is now available. Speak with Thiuna as either a carpenter, leatherworker, or weaver at level 80 or above to undertake the quest.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_710<tab>また、ミーン工芸館取引のストーリークエストが発行されました！
「木工師／革細工師／裁縫師」のいずれかがレベル80以上になると、
ミーン工芸館の「トゥナ」から受注可能です。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_750<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, how good of you to visit! As you can see, we continue fighting the good fight, spurred on by the wonderful sign you crafted for us.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_750<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
会いに来てくれたのね、すごく嬉しいわ！
あなたに作ってもらった看板を励みに、毎日頑張ってるんだ！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_800<tab>Unable to obtain your reward. Your inventory is full.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_800<tab>所持品に空きがないため、
報酬を受け取ることができません。
所持品を空けてから、トゥナに話しかけてください。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_810<tab>In order to make deliveries, you must be a carpenter, leatherworker, or weaver.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_810<tab>手工科との取引を行うには、
「木工師／革細工師／裁縫師」のいずれかである必要があります。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_820<tab>The Crystarium Deliveries list for Thiuna has been updated.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_820<tab>新たな依頼によって納品リストが更新されました。
「トゥナ」に話しかけて、確認してみましょう。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_830<tab>Thiuna is pleased with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Supporter of Cherished Memories<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_830<tab>手工科の貢献ランクが上昇しました！
トゥナはあなたの事を、
「時の工房の協力者」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_840<tab>Thiuna is delighted with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Restorer of Cherished Memories<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_840<tab>手工科の貢献ランクが上昇しました！
トゥナはあなたの事を、
「時の工房の腕達者」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_850<tab>Thiuna is overjoyed with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Custodian of Cherished Memories<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_850<tab>手工科の貢献ランクが上昇しました！
トゥナはあなたの事を、
「時の工房の指南役」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_855<tab>Thiuna is thrilled with your efforts. She now considers you the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Savior of Cherished Memories<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_855<tab>手工科の貢献ランクが上昇しました！
トゥナはあなたの事を、
「時の工房の恩師」と感じているようです！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_860<tab>
target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_SYSTEM_000_860<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_900<tab>To see the children's faces light up was just precious... And it's thanks to the skills I learned from you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_900<tab>夜に怯える子供たちの笑顔、ちゃんと修復できてよかったぁ……。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんから学んだ技術のおかげだわ。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_901<tab><blip> Should there still be children who are afraid of the dark, I can channel my energy to light up their faces directly.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_RECORDSYSTEM_000_901<tab>また夜に怯える子供がいたら、
低圧電流でビリビリ、ピカピカ！
任せロー！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_902<tab>N-No, Noddy! That's not how it works!
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_902<tab>こ、こらぁ！
それはダメでしょ！
……もう、仕方ない子なんだから！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_910<tab>Chora-Zoi says she's crafted a masterpiece thanks to the advice we gave her. I realize I wasn't directly involved in the process as you were...yet it feels as though we've all accomplished something extraordinary.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_910<tab>チョラ・ゾイから話は聞いているわよ。
ミーン工芸館の職人たちの意見も取り入れて、
素敵な道具を作ってくれたとか！

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_911<tab>When one improves upon a tool, they shape it into its most ideal form. It's a bit like restoring old treasures, in a way.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_911<tab>道具を改良する……物のふさわしい形を見定めて磨いていくこと。
それって保存修復師の仕事とも、
似ているところがあるかもしれないわね。

source: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_912<tab>I can't tell you how excited I am to have a splendorous tool of my own. I suspect it'll be a boon to us and our customers both.
target:
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER2_00568_THIUNA_000_912<tab>たくさんの想いを込めて磨かれた道具を使えたら、
「時の工房」での修復仕事も、もっと捗る気がするわ！
